QuestData.Title: A Huge Package
QuestData.Description: Due to the incredible volume of complaints in recent months we have been barred from delivering s... s...$B$B<The Postmaster holds back tears, pain visible in his eyes.>$B$BSolid stone. We're positively swimming in it - if we can't deliver it then pretty soon we will be overwh-$B$B<The Postmaster's eyes light up suddenly.>$B$BThat's it!$B$BThere is an old Consortium portal not far from here that we could deposit it in with none the wiser!$B$BCan you help, $n? The stone is extraordinarily heavy.
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver 1,362 pieces of solid stone to the Ethereal Portal in Dalaran.
